metadata.title: CVE-2021-40575 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - low.
metadata.description: The binary MP4Box in Gpac 1.0.1 has a null pointer dereference vulnerability in the mpgviddmx_process function in reframe_mpgvid.c, which allows attackers to cause a denial of service. This vulnerability is possibly due to an incomplete fix for CVE-2021-40566.

criterions.comment: gpac package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
